title: Home In Beverley Hills Available For Rent
posting_body: IF THIS PROPERTY DOESN'T FIT YOUR NEEDS, FEEL FREE TO CALL OR EMAIL ME
I MAY HAVE OTHER PROPERTIES TO PASS BY YOU
Beautifully remodeled ranch with 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.
Large Kitchen with Oak Cabinets, Limestone Floor & Granite Counters!
New carpet throughout, Spacious private Backyard that is fenced in.
Very central location with tons of shopping and food around.
